mutations.name: Major Attack-Defense Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a significant synergy between Attack and Defense groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Attack and Defense groups are present, both receive a significant attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Attack and Defense groups are present, both receive a 15% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Major Control-Movement Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a significant synergy between Control and Movement groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Control and Movement groups are present, both receive a significant attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Control and Movement groups are present, both receive a 15% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Major Core Resonance
mutations.description: Creates a significant synergy between Core and any other group
mutations.synergyEffect: Core group provides a significant attribute bonus to all other groups
mutations.effectDescription: Core group provides a 10% attribute bonus to all other groups

mutations.name: Major Attack-Control Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a significant synergy between Attack and Control groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Attack and Control groups are present, Attack gains range and Control gains damage
mutations.effectDescription: When Attack and Control groups are present, Attack gains 15% ability range and Control gains 15% ability damage

mutations.name: Major Defense-Movement Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a significant synergy between Defense and Movement groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Defense and Movement groups are present, Defense gains duration and Movement gains cooldown reduction
mutations.effectDescription: When Defense and Movement groups are present, Defense gains 15% ability duration and Movement gains 15% cooldown reduction

mutations.name: Triple Role Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a synergy between three different role groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Attack, Defense, and Control groups are present, all receive an attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Attack, Defense, and Control groups are present, all receive a 10% attribute bonus
